rval.value: A user\'s regular batch jobs are added to this file
Most crons need to be huped after file changes
Rotate file if above specified size

We have to special case 50 because of the way dist classes
                  work you would always get 50 defined
Delete plain files inside directory older than max_days
Invalid record headers indicate that the database corruption is beyond repair. It will be automatically re-created.

promises.promiser: $(this.bundle) $(sys.fqhost): Detected invalid record header in $(db) - tried to repair
